example.eg: We mixed red and yellow paint to create orange paint.
example.egtrans: 我们把红色涂料和黄色涂料混和调成橙色涂料。

example.eg: Mix the butter with the sugar, then add the eggs.
example.egtrans: 把黄油和食糖搅拌在一起，然后加入鸡蛋。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将...和...搅拌在一起, 将...和...拌在一起

example.eg: The recipe says to mix the ingredients until the butter has been absorbed.
example.egtrans: 配方说要把各种成分搅拌到一起，直到黄油被吸收。

example.eg: Just add the water and the juice, and they will mix on their own.
example.egtrans: 在果汁里加些水，两者自己就会混合了。

example.eg: Orange paint is a mix of red paint and yellow paint.
example.egtrans: 橙色涂料是红色涂料和黄色涂料的混合物。

example.eg: The correct mix to create this colour paint is 4 parts blue and 2 parts red.
example.egtrans: 要制造这种颜色的涂料，正确的成分比例是4份蓝色加2份红色。

example.eg: Don't bother making a cake from scratch.  Just buy a cake mix.
example.egtrans: 不用那么麻烦从头开始做蛋糕。去买些蛋糕混合料就可以了。

example.eg: There was a good mix at the party - plenty of single guys and single girls.
example.egtrans: 派对上的人员组合得很好：单身男士和单身女孩都很多。

example.eg: The mix of the ingredients took ten minutes to accomplish.
I created a mix of my favourite music for you on a CD.
They say that American guys and Spanish girls mix pretty well.
I really like Robert, but we don't mix.
The DJ mixed the two tunes expertly.  We should go to that dance club again.
The politician mixed with the crowd, saying hello to everybody.
I like to mix with people of all ages as this helps broaden my outlook on life.

dsense.name: mix up [sth], mix [sth] up, mix up [sth] and [sth]

example.eg: My grandfather is always mixing up his words.
example.egtrans: 我爷爷总是弄错要用的词语。

example.eg: A lot of people mix up the meaning of 'imply' with the meaning of 'infer'.
example.egtrans: 许多人将“暗示”与“推断”的意思搞混。

example.eg: Please don't mix up my chess pieces.
example.egtrans: 请不要把我的象棋子搞乱。

example.eg: I'm going to mix up some strawberry milkshakes.
example.egtrans: 我要去混合调制一些草莓奶昔。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 搅拌，搅匀, 混合调制

example.eg: This cake mix is very convenient: you only need to add oil and an egg.

dsense.name: mix CD
dsense.guideword: (compilation of songs recorded to a CD)

example.eg: The hockey teams really mixed it up last night; some of the boys went home with fewer teeth.
example.egtrans: 昨晚，两支曲棍球队打起来了。好多男孩缺着牙齿回家。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打起来，扭打起来, 争执起来，争吵起来

example.eg: Our basketball team isn't doing very well; I wish they would mix it up a little.
example.egtrans: 我们的篮球队表现不佳，我希望他们加把劲。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 加把劲, 更积极地竞争

example.eg: The band like to mix it up a bit to keep things interesting.
John really mixed it up with Joe; now both of them are in the hospital.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…大打出手，与…扭打在一起, 与…争执不休

example.eg: Mix together the flour, egg and milk until you have a smooth paste.

dsense.name: mix [sth] and [sth] together, mix together [sth] and [sth]

example.eg: If you mix blue and red together, you get purple.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将...掺在一起, 将...混合在一起

dsense.name: mix up [sb] and [sb], mix up [sb] with [sb]

example.eg: I always mix up Scarlett Johansson and Amber Heard; to me they look really alike!
example.egtrans: 我总是将斯嘉丽·约翰逊与艾梅柏·希尔德搞混，就我而言她们长得实在太像了！

example.eg: The nurse administered heparin instead of Coumadin, a fatal mix-up.
example.egtrans: 护士使用了肝素而非香豆素，真是致命的混淆。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 什锦干果, 混合果仁
